questions.question: What is Cube, and what can I do with it?
questions.answer: Cube is the supplier portal where you can manage your purchase orders, invoices, returns, and communication with Panda. It provides real-time updates and streamlines supplier-related activities.

questions.question: How do I log in to Cube?
questions.answer: You will receive login credentials via email. Use the username and temporary password provided to log in for the first time. You'll need to reset your password upon login.

questions.question: I forgot my password. How can I reset it?
questions.answer: On the login page, click 'Forgot Password' and follow the instructions to reset your password. If you still face issues, contact your Key Account Manager (KAM) or support.

questions.question: Can I access Cube on my mobile device?
questions.answer: Yes, Cube is mobile-friendly and can be accessed through your browser on a mobile device.

questions.question: What are the system requirements to use Cube?
questions.answer: Cube works on most modern browsers like Google Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Microsoft Edge. Ensure your browser is updated to the latest version.

questions.question: How do I view my purchase orders?
questions.answer: Log in to Cube, navigate to the Purchase Orders section, and select the PO you want to view. You can also download the PO as a PDF.

questions.question: Can I update or modify a purchase order?
questions.answer: No, purchase orders are generated by Panda. If there’s an issue, contact your KAM for clarification or adjustments.

questions.question: What should I do if I don't agree with the details of a purchase order?
questions.answer: Reach out to your KAM or the support team via the communication tools in Cube to resolve the issue.

questions.question: How do I upload an invoice?
questions.answer: Go to the Invoices section, click on 'Upload Invoice,' attach the invoice document, and fill in the required details.

questions.question: What file formats are supported for invoices?
questions.answer: Cube supports PDF, JPEG, and PNG formats for invoice uploads.

questions.question: How do I track the status of my submitted invoice?
questions.answer: Navigate to the Invoices section, and under 'My Invoices,' you’ll see the status (e.g., Submitted, Approved, Rejected).

questions.question: Why was my invoice rejected?
questions.answer: The rejection reason will be displayed in the invoice details. Common reasons include missing information, incorrect amounts, or discrepancies with the purchase order.

questions.question: How do I handle product returns?
questions.answer: In Cube, navigate to the Returns section, select the relevant PO or item, and submit a return request. Follow the instructions provided.

questions.question: How do I track the status of a return?
questions.answer: Go to the Returns section, where you can see the status (e.g., Pending, Approved, Completed).

questions.question: How do I add or remove users for my supplier account?
questions.answer: Contact your KAM or the Cube support team to request user changes.

questions.question: What should I do if my account is locked?
questions.answer: Accounts are locked after multiple failed login attempts. Contact your KAM or support to unlock your account.

questions.question: I’m experiencing issues with Cube. What should I do?
questions.answer: Clear your browser cache and try again. Ensure you’re using a supported browser. Contact support if the issue persists.

questions.question: Why can’t I see some purchase orders or invoices?
questions.answer: Ensure you have the correct access permissions. If the issue persists, contact your KAM.

questions.question: Why am I logged out of Cube automatically?
questions.answer: For security reasons, Cube automatically logs out inactive users after a set period. Simply log in again.

questions.question: Can I download reports from Cube?
questions.answer: Yes, Cube allows you to download reports related to POs, invoices, and returns in Excel or PDF format.

questions.question: How can I contact support?
questions.answer: Use the Help or Contact Support section in Cube to raise a ticket or email your query.

questions.question: How often is Cube updated?
questions.answer: Cube is updated regularly to improve features and address any issues. Notifications will be sent in advance for major updates.
